text: Ayro kak tawqe gambii kee Ayro kak korta gambiiy ken Nammayih fanal tanim inkih Yalli-le, tokkel Salaatah elle Afkuninnaanih gambil, tokkel too arac kay qhiblatay usuk Siinik edde leeda kinni, diggah Yalli isi Naqoosah farakka-le racmat leeh ken Niyaayit tanim yaaxigi kinniih tukaak maqellitta
